Posts.Content: RabbitLady1970 wrote: I recently had a lump removed from my right breast..was told it wasn't cancer but needed to be removed...now I have developed a lump under that arm ,just above the breast...It is painful and causing me to have limited use of that arm because it feels weak and hurts...my Dr.sent me for an ultra sound today and the tech can feel the lump but could never get it show up on the scan..the radiologists says I'm good to go and dosent seem to be concerned since it didn't show up.....Has anyone else dealt with this ,and if so what should I do now ????
